_source.text: According to the three-month outlook from the U.S. Climate Prediction Center, the odds are better than even that Oregon and Washington, as well as California, Nevada and parts of Arizona, Utah, Idaho and Montana, will experience above normal temperatures.

_source.text: [40] In these six months, campaigning from Concord, New Hampshire to California, I came to know our country better than ever before in my life, and I gathered up memories that are going to be with me for the rest of my days.

country **better** **than** ever before in my life, and I gathered up memories that are going to be with me for the rest of my days.
